interpretation:
The "rightwards hand" emoji represents the power of action and movement. This card is a call to action, urging you to take charge of your life and move forward with confidence. It suggests that you have the power to make a positive impact on your life and the lives of others. It also signifies the importance of physical activity and exercise, reminding you to prioritize your health and well-being.

In a reading, the "rightwards hand" card may suggest that you are ready to take the next step in a project or relationship. It may also indicate that you need to be more proactive in pursuing your goals. This card can serve as a reminder to trust your instincts and have faith in your abilities. It can also signify a need to let go of fear and hesitation and embrace the opportunities that life presents. Overall, the "rightwards hand" card is a powerful symbol of action and potential, encouraging you to take charge of your life and create the future you desire.
